parties.title: Awọn ẹgbẹ oselu
parties.subtitle: Dapọ ni agbaye ni ayika awọn iye ti a pin

elections.title: Awọn idibo idanwo
elections.subtitle: Ṣe ayẹwo pẹlu ijọba onilẹ agbaye

parties.loading_more: N gbe awọn ẹgbẹ siwaju sii...
parties.found_party_and_earn: Da egbe kan sile ki o si gba awọn iranlọwọ

dialogs.about_to_found: O n fẹ ṣẹda ẹgbẹ tuntun kan.
dialogs.about_to_dissolve: O n fẹ yọ {partyName} kuro. Iṣẹ yii ko le pada sẹhin.
dialogs.leader_warning_found: O jẹ oludari {partyName} lọwọlọwọ. Didasilẹ egbe tuntun yoo yọ egbe rẹ lọwọlọwọ kuro.

detail.not_found_description: Ẹgbẹ ti o n wa ko wa tabi ti yọ kuro.

pre_verification.description: Awọn idibo idanwo n bọ laipẹ. Jẹrisi idanimọ rẹ ni bayi lati ṣe mura nigba ti idibo ba ṣii.

coming_soon.description: Idibo idanwo yoo bẹrẹ laipẹ. A ti fọwọsi rẹ tẹlẹ, o si ti ṣetan lati dibo ni kete ti idibo ba bẹrẹ.

vote.no_active_election: Ko si ìdìbọ tó ń lọ lọwọ

app-purpose.question: Kini Orilẹ-ede Agbaye?
app-purpose.answer: Orilẹ-ede Agbaye jẹ pẹpẹ iṣakoso ti o ni owo dijitali tirẹ ti o n gbero lati dẹ agbekalẹ tiwantiwa fun alaafia ati aabo agbaye.

what-is-wdd.question: Kini WDD?
what-is-wdd.answer: WDD (drachma agbaye) jẹ owo osise blockchain-native ti Orilẹ-ede Agbaye, ti a ṣe agbekalẹ bi aami ERC-20 ti o wọpọ ni ọpọlọpọ awọn nẹtiwọọki.

drachma-value.question: Nibo ni drachma gba iye rẹ?
drachma-value.answer: Drachma gba iye-owo rẹ lati jẹ owo osise ti Orilẹ-ede Agbaye. Bi oju-ọna ijọba agbaye wa ba n dagba, WDD le di ọkọ ayika ti pinpin agbaye ati oju-ọna pataki ti iyipada ni ọrọ-aje agbaye.

identity-verification.question: Bawo ni iwadi aami ṣe n ṣiṣẹ?
identity-verification.answer: Orilẹ-ede Agbaye nlo Self lati jẹrisi idanimọ rẹ nipasẹ pasipọọti rẹ tabi ID orilẹ-ede rẹ. Ikọkọ rẹ ni aabo—Self kan jẹrisi pe o jẹ eniyan otitọ laisi fifihan eyikeyi data ti ara ẹni rẹ.

test-elections.question: Kini awọn idibo idanwo?
test-elections.answer: Awọn idibo idanwo jẹ awọn idanwo nibiti awọn ara ilu Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ Ayé dibo fun awọn ẹgbẹ oselu. Gbogbo ẹgbẹ ni a fi kun laifọwọyi lori iwe idibo, aridaju anfani dogba fun gbogbo awọn oludari ti o nireti.

party-subsidies.question: Bawo ni awọn ifunni ẹgbẹ ṣe n ṣiṣẹ?
party-subsidies.answer: Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ Ayé n ṣe inawo awọn ẹgbẹ oselu ti o da lori atilẹyin tiwantiwa. A n pin awọn ifunni WDD ni ibamu si awọn abajade idibo, ni idaniloju pe ibo kọọkan n mu awọn orisun inawo ẹgbẹ pọ si taara.

verification-required.question: Ṣé ìjẹ́rìí pọn dandan láti kópa?
verification-required.answer: Ìjẹ́rìí idánimọ̀ wúlò fún ìbò dídì nìkan. O lè dá ẹgbẹ́ sílẹ̀ kí o sì gbé WDD tí o rí láti inú owó ìrànwọ́ ẹgbẹ́ lọ láìsí ìjẹ́rìí.

sign_out.confirm: Ṣe o da ọ loju pe o fẹ jade?

send.title: Fi WDD
send.choice_description: Yan bi o fẹ fi drachma rẹ ranṣẹ.

transfer_to_citizen.title: Gbe
transfer_to_citizen.description: Gbe WDD si ara ilu miiran

withdraw_to_crypto.title: Yọ
withdraw_to_crypto.description: Yọ WDD soke si iroye crypto

delete_account.description: Eyi yoo pa iroyin rẹ lailai ati yọ awọn data rẹ kuro ni awọn server wa. Iṣẹ yii ko le yipada — tẹsiwaju pẹlu iṣọra.

receive.title: Gba WDD
receive.description: Pin orukọ olumulo rẹ lati gba WDD lati awọn ọrẹ rẹ.

username.label: Orukọ olumulo
username.description: Awọn kikọ 3-30, alfanumeriki, awọn ila isalẹ ati awọn hyphen

self.dialog_description: Ṣàyẹ̀wò kóòdù QR yìí láti fọwọsi pẹ̀lú Self.
self.mobile_dialog_description: A ó yí ọ lọ sí app Self láti parí ìfọwọsi.
self.supported_countries: Àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí a ń ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn

verification_explainer.title: Ijẹrisi nilo
verification_explainer.description: Jọwọ pari ijẹrisi lati yọ tokens jade.

re_verification_explainer.title: Ijẹrisi tuntun nilo
re_verification_explainer.description: Fun aabo rẹ, a nilo ijẹrisi tuntun ṣaaju awọn iṣẹ wiwu bi yiyọ jade. Eyi ṣe iranlọwọ lati dènà akọọnti rẹ lati wiwọle laisi aṣẹ.

wdd_import_info.message_prefix: Ọpọlọpọ awọn apamọwọ nikan ni o ṣe afihan WDD lẹhin ti a ti fi ọwọ mu si sori ẹgbẹ ti a yan nipasẹ

wallet.contract_address_error: Ko le ya jade si adirẹsi adehun

auth.sign_in_or_create: Wọle si akọọlẹ rẹ pẹlu passkey, lilo aami ika rẹ, iwọran oju tabi titiidi iboju.
auth.passkey_name_description: Sọ orukọ passkey rẹ lati ṣe idaniloju rẹ ni oluṣakoso ọrọ aṣina rẹ.
